last_episode_to_air.overview: THE BEGINING OF THE WIDOW AS A MOB MASTER

name: La Viuda De La Mafia
overview: The widow of the Mafia was a successful Colombian series, produced by Coestrellas for RCN Television in 2004. Its protagonists were Carolina Gómez and Cuban Abel Rodríguez, the antagonistic performance of Patrick Delmas and the debut in the soap operas of Katherine Porto
